notes: Beautifully renovated apartment with minimalist modern design, featuring light wood flooring, built-in white cabinetry, induction cooktop, sleek kitchen with quartz countertops, and wall-mounted AC. The space appears very clean with smooth rounded furniture edges, though only the living area and kitchen are shownâ€”no bathroom or bedroom views are available. Natural light is limited (small frosted kitchen window, one narrow bedroom window); at 19 ping for NT$80k in Da'an this is a premium studio/1BR. Being on 4F of a 14F building strongly suggests elevator access. Baby safety looks reasonable with no visible balcony or stairs, but the limited photos make a full assessment difficult.
